content:
KeyValueStoreTransactionSettings Class

Definition

Specifies the optional settings to describe the behavior of transactions supported by KeyValueStoreReplica.

In this Article

public class KeyValueStoreTransactionSettings
Inheritance
Object
KeyValueStoreTransactionSettings

Constructors

KeyValueStoreTransactionSettings()

Creates anew instance of the KeyValueStoreTransactionSettings class..

Properties

SerializationBlockSize

Specifies the block size (in bytes) to use when allocating memory for replication operations.
